definition: disgrace/dishonor/to insult/to bring disgrace or humiliation to/to be indebted to/self-deprecating/Taiwan pr. [ru4]

sentences.english: How can you suffer such insolence?
sentences.chinese: 你怎能忍受這樣的侮辱呢？

sentences.english: Throwing shoes at somebody is a supreme insult in the Middle East.
sentences.chinese: 在中東地區，向人扔鞋子是對人最嚴重的侮辱。

sentences.english: And blaspheming , many other things they said against him.
sentences.chinese: 他們還說了許多別的侮辱他的話。

sentences.english: His slight still sticks in my craw .
sentences.chinese: 他的侮辱仍然使我無法忍受。

sentences.english: The insult to the adult consulter results in multiplication of the faulty faucets.
sentences.chinese: 對成年諮詢者的侮辱導致有缺陷水龍頭成倍增加。

sentences.english: You insult the Queen of Burgund in public with these lies?
sentences.chinese: 你居然在大庭廣衆下用這種謊言侮辱勃艮的皇后？

sentences.english: I have read a sentence in an essay:Even Yangjia are put to death, please don't use any contumelious words on him.
sentences.chinese: 即使楊佳被判死刑，也不許用侮辱性的字眼。

sentences.english: This man is for ever hurling insults against me.
sentences.chinese: 這個傢伙一直在大聲叫罵些侮辱我的話。

sentences.english: And in West Africa, the gesture is even more insulting than the upraised middle finger.
sentences.chinese: 而在西非，這姿態甚至比舉起中指更具侮辱性。

sentences.english: Dont ruminate on past affronts or injustices.
sentences.chinese: 莫要沉湎於過去所受的侮辱或者不公平。

sentences.english: What have you learned from King Hezekiah's handling of Rabshakeh's public humiliation?
sentences.chinese: 希西家王對拉伯沙基侮辱的處理有何可學之處？

sentences.english: Jade sentimental hand can not run out, the king of the glass cup.
sentences.chinese: 玉多情手不了侮辱跑了出去，金常務摔掉杯子泄氣。

sentences.english: China was indeed humiliated by Western powers in its modern history.
sentences.chinese: 在近代史當中，中國的確受到了西方列強的侮辱。

sentences.english: This was insulting to Shelley and only likely to get me laughed at.
sentences.chinese: 這是對雪萊的侮辱，結果卻使我可能成爲笑柄。

sentences.english: He made a witty comeback to the insult.
sentences.chinese: 他對別人的侮辱給予一個機智的反駁。

sentences.english: Calling Rena an idiot would be a real insult.
sentences.chinese: 罵蕾娜是白癡真是一種侮辱。

definition: variant of 污衊|污蔑[wu1 mie4]
